main event: A UFO was observed in Kettering, Ohio on March 7, 1968.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by one individual who saw the object three times,There were a total of three witnesses to the event,The object was described as cone-shaped and approximately 1 mile away at the time of observation,The object was in sight for 1 hour and 23 minutes,The observer felt the object moved suddenly at times and eventually disappeared.
witness description: one civilian who was 23 years old, male
